subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
Shoes and Boots
lead_paragraph: Twelve N.B.A. prospects are listed as 7-footers, but among players measured at the draft combine, only one, Rudy Gobert, was that tall without footwear.
snippet: Twelve N.B.A. prospects are listed as 7-footers, but among players measured at the draft combine, only one, Rudy Gobert, was that tall without footwear.
